address: Xã Hoằng Lưu, Huyện Hoằng Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Hoằng Lưu"**

Okay, so I'm given the old address "Xã Hoằng Lưu, Huyện Hoằng Hóa, Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" and I need to figure out its new administrative unit. First things first, I break down the address.  I identify "Xã Hoằng Lưu" as the old ward and "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" as the province.

Now, I'm going to consult my province resolutions. I need to make sure "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa" hasn't undergone any changes at the provincial level, so I check for those resolutions.  I've got "60-NQ/TW," which lists provinces and their status.  Ah, good, Thanh Hóa is unchanged.  No province-level issues to worry about.

Next up, I need to dig into the details. I will have to start scanning through other resolutions within Thanh Hóa, especially looking for any mentions of "Xã Hoằng Lưu." The key resolution to look at is "1686/NQ-UBTVQH15," which deals with the restructuring of administrative units at the commune level.

Line 19 doesn't mention "Xã Hoằng Lưu," but Line 23 is a different story. It states that "Xã Hoằng Thắng, Hoằng Phong, Hoằng Lưu and Hoằng Châu" will be merged into a new commune called "xã Hoằng Châu." Bingo!  I've found my answer. The old ward "Xã Hoằng Lưu" is merging into "xã Hoằng Châu."

Now, I need to check my "New wards" database to retrieve the relevant information for "Xã Hoằng Châu."  I find the entry: `{"ward_code":"15976","ward_name":"Xã Hoằng Châu","province_name":"Tỉnh Thanh Hóa"}`. Perfect.

Finally, I'll compile my output: I'll include the resolution and line number as my `citation` for proper sourcing. Because I found a direct merge, my `confidence` will be "high". The `province_name` will be "Tỉnh Thanh Hóa," and the `ward_code` and `ward_name` are taken directly from the "New wards" data.  All set!

citation.header: 1686/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Thanh Hóa
citation.line: 23. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Hoằng Thắng, Hoằng Phong, Hoằng Lưu và Hoằng Châu thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Hoằng Châu.
